ARABIC: سُبْحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْأَزْوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنۢبِتُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Glory be to Him who created all the pairs: from what the earth produces and from themselves and from things unknown to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: All glory to Him who created pairs of everything that grows from the earth, and out of themselves, and other things they do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Holy is He Who created all things in pairs, whether it be of what the earth produces, and of themselves, and of what they do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: All glory belongs to the One Who has created pairs out of what grow from the earth, out of their soul and out of that which they do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Purity is to Him Who created all pairs, from what the earth grows, and of themselves, and from the things they do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Glory be to Him Who has created all the pairs of that which the earth produces, as well as of their own kind, and of that which they know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Glory be to Him Who created pairs of all things, of what the earth grows, and of their kind and of what they do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Glory be to Him, who created all the pairs of what the earth produces, and of themselves, and of what they know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Glory be to Him Who created all the sexual pairs, of that which the earth groweth, and of themselves, and of that which they know not!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Holy is He who created all things in pairs; of what the earth grows, and of themselves, and other things which they do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Hallowed be He who hath created all the pairs of that which the earth groweth, and of themselves and of that which they know not!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Immaculate is He who has created all the kinds of what the earth grows, and of themselves, and of what they do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Glory to Allah, Who created in pairs all things that the earth produces, as well as their own (human) kind and (other) things of which they have no knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Glory be to Him, Who has created all the pairs of that which the earth produces, as well as of their own (human) kind (male and female), and of that which they know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Exaltations to Him who created pairs of all the things the earth produces and of themselves, and that of which they have no knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Glory be to Him who created all the pairs; of what the earth produces, and of their own selves, and of what they do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Exalted is He who created all pairs - from what the earth grows and from themselves and from that which they do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:36] Glory be to Him Who created all the pairs, the specimens, of what the earth produces, of seeds and other things, and of themselves, of males and females, and of what they do not know, of marvellous and strange creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Glory be to Him) Allah exonerates Himself (Who created all the sexual pairs) of all kinds, (of that which the earth groweth) the sweet, the sour and other things, (and of themselves) the male and female, (and of that which they know not) of other different kinds in the land and sea!
